DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study was to evaluate the clinical usefulness of TFU (transfontanel ultrasound)for the prediction of fluid responsiveness in children undergoing congenital heart surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Fluid Responsiveness Using TFU (Transfontanel Ultrasound) in Children With Congenital Heart Disease
DOC.criteria: pediatric patients undergoing cardiac surgery preterm closure of anterior fontanelle anatomical abnormalities on aortic arch (ex, patent ductus arteriosus) presence of intracardiac and extracardiac shunt
